name: Gift for my Sweetie.
description:
This game is for game jam Extra credit. The theme of this jam is "present".

This game is about trading item which mean buy cheap and sell high.

You play as someone who is about to get a wedding ring before Xmas (mean quest). But you do not have enough money to buy it and forced you to trade and earn money.

In the meantime you will have some side request from friend that you need to accomplish. 

Please give it a try.
